backend/main.mo: Main canister actor managing menu items, orders, documents, notifications, storage, authorization, and migration with various state maps and helper functions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that filters out old Curry items and replaces them with a predefined Curry menu set while preserving non‑Curry items.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a specific admin menu management feature to affected frontend files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing human‑written summaries of all key frontend components, pages, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH color tokens, theming variables, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point setting up metadata, PWA configuration, icons, and the root element for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest declaring app name, theme colors, icons, and metadata for Zaika Kitchen.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Custom service worker implementing caching for static and dynamic assets with install, activate, fetch handling, and messaging support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app’s router, theme provider, cart context, and global UI components including the layout and install prompt.
frontend/src/components/CartContext.tsx: Implements a React context for managing cart items, quantities, and total price.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer showing restaurant info, location, contact, and hours with a fallback location.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the main navigation bar with links, cart totals, notifications, user auth, and admin options.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Handles showing and responding to the PWA install prompt with options to install or dismiss.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the page layout containing the header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetup.tsx: Admin-only form for configuring Stripe payment settings with validation and status handling.
frontend/src/constants/menuCategories.ts: Exports menu category lists for filtering and admin management.
frontend/src/constants/whatsapp.ts: Defines WhatsApp click‑to‑chat phone number and base URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and related status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods including roles, menu items, orders, notifications, and Stripe operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Implements the admin dashboard with order management, Stripe config, restaurant settings, notifications, and menu item management.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles cart checkout flow including Stripe session creation, WhatsApp ordering, and cart validation.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact details with location, hours, phone, and WhatsApp quick contact using fetched restaurant data.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature cards, and navigation buttons for menu and WhatsApp chat.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Displays menu items with category filtering, loading skeletons, and add-to-cart functionality.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays user notifications with icons, read status handling, and navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/OrderHistoryPage.tsx: Shows a logged-in user's order history with sortable table, status badges, and navigation to the menu or order details.
frontend/src/pages/OrderTrackingPage.tsx: Displays detailed tracking info for a specific order, including status indicators and order metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Informs the user of a cancelled payment and provides buttons to retry checkout or return to the menu.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Processes Stripe payment status, creates an order from cart items, clears the cart, and displays a loading or success screen with the order ID.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds WhatsApp deep links and formats order messages from cart items and totals.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, feature requirements, and pending requests related to OCR-based menu item replacement for the Curry category.
